data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Mpigi, Uganda will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mpigi, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Mpigi that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 5,138 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 10,362 lost in Mpigi that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Hindi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, guide the church in Mpigi, Uganda to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 15,500 citizens of the the state of Mpigi.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mpigi, Uganda has a population of 15,500.

We estimate Mpigi has 5,138 people who might know Jesus, 7,740 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,622 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Mpigi access to a Bible in their own language.
